text: Two of the best talks I've ever attended were hers - I think about what she said almost daily.  So brilliant.
@jeffjarvis I think it is a peregrine falcon.  The back and tail feathers don’t appear to be the reddish brown of a red tail.  The breast feathers and head shape look more like a falcon to me.

So excited to be launching today!

William Gruber, Pfizer’s SVP of vaccine clinical R&D, “I’ve been in vaccine development for 35 years. I’ve seen some really good things. This is extraordinary.” He added, “This really bodes well for us being able to get a handle on the epidemic and get us out of this situation.”
Amazing news from Pfizer!

Tonight, I explained the historic significance of 
@KamalaHarris's election as VP to my 4-year-old twin daughters.  One proclaimed "This calls for a dance party!"  So we had one.  It was epic.

This makes me so optimistic.  For a public company CEO to be so specific about timelines - all of which are in the next 5 weeks (35 days) - means he has to have a very high level of confidence that this is likely to happen.  My take: Pfizer vaccine could be available by January.
So grateful and impressed!
@pnkjku Thank you!
From my 45th birthday celebration yesterday!  A delicious ice cream cake from ricksicecream, felt birthday crown and Mom hearts made by my kids. https://t.co/YFsSq4H6n9

My amazing husband (@zackbogue ) and kids got up early and made the legendary @cipriani Vanilla Meringue Cake that I love.  I was absolutely blown away, and it’s even more delicious than it looks!  Happy Mother’s Day to all of the moms out there! https://t.co/1tLMbuzeKo
Happy Mother’s Day! https://t.co/gvCWB3VF73
May the 4th be with you!  Super excited to introduce our 7 year old to Star Wars tonight!  Watching the first one tonight, we are... #episode4  #newhope https://t.co/VxypXkxv7P
We had a blast with @KIDS_DISCOVER Outdoor Chalk Paint!  About midway through we got the idea to do hand and foot prints - messy but super fun! https://t.co/fVMZezI4OD

Tonight, we recreated Italian Fries from @WausauMineCo at home in California.  A long time favorite of mine and an instant hit with the family.  Thanks to pizza man @zackbogue for firing the pie! https://t.co/rM6evWmm82

The highlight of my week was seeing season passes for Jackson Hole (@jhski) next year go on sale!  I'm sure skiing will be different, but it makes me wish all the more that I had a fast forward button to get to next year.  https://t.co/aKIBCTvBt5

Last night, my 4 year old twin daughter asked “how could two small creatures (the presumed bat and pangolin) cause such a big problem?” I said that it was surprising, but we shouldn’t  underestimate the impact of small things -- maybe 2 little girls could help solve the problem.

@coldwired @anitakgran We do.  We also offer same leave for new parents thru adoptions and surrogacies.
.@coldwired @anitakgran And we offer paternity leave and, in 2015, 823 men at Yahoo took a paternity leave.
.@anitakgran # of women who took leave = 469; # of women who took maximum leave = 349; # of women who took less than one month leave = 1(me)
.@anitakgran Thanks for asking me to explain/comment and HAPPY MOTHER'S DAY to all!
.@anitakgran I understand there is a worry about setting the tone, but the data suggests it isn't an issue at Yahoo.
.@anitakgran I understand I'm the exception, and need to be, for all the reasons cited. I find other ways/times to bond with my kids.
@anitakgran # of women who took leave = 469; # of women who took maximum leave = 349; # of women who took less than one month leave = 1 (me)
.@anitakgran At Yahoo in 2015, every new mom took at least 1 month of maternity leave and nearly 75% took full amount allowed (14 weeks).
